name: Lander Luna
description:
Fly as far as across the lunar surface! Use your thruster to fly further to get more credits to buy upgrades with.    Be sure to save enough fuel to land.  You can also refuel by touching down softly.

Controls

W or Up Arrow: Activate Thruster

S, Down Arrow, or Spacebar: Damp Rotation

A and D or Left and Right Arrows: Rotate
